title: AFK's and DC's
body: Riot needs to seriously crack down when it comes to punishment for afk or disconnecting in ranked games, it's getting ridiculous. I've been playing since S1 and every season seems to have more and more of these leavers. I understand that not everyone has the best internet but they need to adapt their play times, losing LP constantly as a result of this is ridiculous. So far today I've played 6 ranked games, 3 of which had allies who afk'd and 2 of which had Disconnects.
